data.actual_result: You may get ratelimited, as if the client was attempting to regenerate the invite everytime
data.expected_result: You should not get ratelimited for doing that. After you generated the initial invite, this one should be cached and subsequent openings of the Create invite screen will show this same invite, unless the client receives an event telling the invite is no longer valid
data.short_description: Repeatedly opening and closing the Create invite screen can get you ratelimited, even though no new invites are being created
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can invite people  - Open Create invite screen - Go back  - Repeat two steps above a few times
